ttOperator.ttScript: return (inAppProduct_levels == 0 and level09Unlocked ~= 1 and level08Done == 1 and level09Done == 0)

return ((inAppProductFullVersion == 0) and (inAppProduct_decorations == 0 or inAppProduct_levels == 0 or inAppProductRemoveAds == 0))
